name: Angry Bird (no s)
description:
The first project I tackled (well, more like first tutorial I followed) when trying to get into Unity this week, it's just five looping levels and is kinda broken, but we love her anyways. Click and drag your bird to launch him. You can press "R" to reset a level if you get stuck.

Thank you friend Alex for drawing me bird and a nightmare.

Also all rights to Rovio, obviously. I do not own the angry bird.

Tutorial I used: youtube.com/watch?v=Lu76c85LhGY

Also might fuck around and make a video documenting my journey with Unity: youtube.com/channel/UCB6l8iha0ZjxnTB6RtVj-Iw
